title: 大家能教我怎么改论坛里的签名吗？
author: JKL81543764
txt_content:
As title,pursuing big brand how can i change the front in the BBS,such as the dragon egg there are posting their links~Chinese translation：
      如题，求大神教我怎么改论坛里的前面，比如龙蛋啦~还有自己发贴的链接啦~
        jun，i am an eagle arter post in english or vernacular,is almost as the writings in classical style.thank you.
      这个不翻译，自己琢磨。

replies.author: Forsworn_
replies.txt_content:
直接就可以改吧= = IMG倒是也应该行= =
龙蛋什么的。。一个就是90字节。。所以楼主加油升级吧= =

replies.author: JKL81543764
MC大湿
replies.txt_content:
龙蛋不知道耶 真心没玩过 至于发帖的链接 
 (╯‵□′)╯︵   [water_buket]
在添加链接里输入链接和需要的文字就行了

replies.txt_content:
